channel.title: Does Fool get gold after win if he leaves?
channel.description: I just got hung D1 as fool. There's no reason for me to stay and watch the whole game right, I already won. Do I get the gold if I leave early?

item.title: Does Fool get gold after win if he leaves?
item.dc:creator: PandaKing
item.description:
I’m curious too because every time I win early, I stay the whole game to see the Win/Gold message at the end then leave but from what you are saying, there might be a way to leave after you win?

item.title: Does Fool get gold after win if he leaves?
item.dc:creator: TBWolf
item.description:
Right now, I’m almost positive he doesn’t since no other class does either, and I don’t think it’s a mechanic that’s implemented to have leavers get gold yet.

Will likely be implemented soon from what I’ve heard from the devs.

Read full topic
